list_definition.definition: a covering hung over a throne, bed etc or (on poles) as a shelter

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We sheltered under a canvas canopy in front of the restaurant entrance.

list_ex_of_english: Tree canopies were closed throughout the study period with virtually no undergrowth.

The objective of this study was to determine the time course of leaf area index and closure of oil palm canopies.
Within-row tree canopies were closed throughout the period of study.
A comparison of a hierarchy of models for determining energy-balance components over vegetation canopies.
